r.d: Zip is an extension to create, modify and read zip files.
r.n: - Add missing openbasedir or safemode (php 5.x and 4.x) checks in zip:// stream or ZipArchive::open - Fixed possible relative path issues in zip_open and TS mode (old API) - rename SAFEMODE_CHECKFILE to OPENBASEDIR_CHECKPATH (no confusion when used wiht php6)
